articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Ukraine: 38-hour curfew ordered in southern Zaporizhzhia city after shelling kills nine
articles.description: The Ukrainian military imposed a 38-hour curfew in the southern city of Zaporizhzhia, starting at 1400 GMT on Saturday and ending early on Monday, deputy mayor Anatoliy Kurtiev said.
articles.content:
Nine people were killed and 17 wounded in shelling of the suburbs of the city of Zaporizhzhia in southern Ukraine on Friday, deputy mayor Anatoliy Kurtiev said on Saturday.

articles.title: Jay Shah’s term as ACC president ‘unanimously’ extended
articles.description: BCCI secretary Jay Shah’s term as the president of the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) was on Saturday unanimously extended by a year to the 2024 Annual General Meeting (AGM). The decision was taken at the ACC AGM in Colombo on Saturday.
